verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w To|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* tune \w of|strong="H4387"\w* “Do \w Not|strong="H1732"\w* Destroy.” \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Miktam \w of|strong="H4387"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Do you indeed speak justly, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* rulers? Do you judge uprightly, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4387"\w* men?

\w No|strong="H1696"\w*, \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hearts \w you|strong="H1696"\w* devise injustice; \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hands \w you|strong="H1696"\w* mete \w out|strong="H1696"\w* violence \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H5766"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* estranged \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* womb; \w the|strong="H3027"\w* liars go astray \w from|strong="H3027"\w* birth.

\w Their|strong="H7563"\w* venom \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* venom \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snake, \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cobra \w that|strong="H7563"\w* shuts its ears,
refusing \w to|strong="H2534"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3644"\w* tune \w of|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* charmer \w who|strong="H1823"\w* skillfully weaves his spell.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, shatter \w their|strong="H8085"\w* teeth \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* mouths; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, tear \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* fangs \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* lions.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* vanish \w like|strong="H3068"\w* water \w that|strong="H3068"\w* runs off; \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bow, \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w be|strong="H3068"\w* blunted.

\w Like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* slug \w that|strong="H4325"\w* dissolves \w in|strong="H1980"\w* its slime, \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman’s stillborn child, \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H3988"\w* never see \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sun.

\w Before|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H2372"\w* pots \w can|strong="H1980"\w* feel \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w* thorns—whether green \w or|strong="H1077"\w* dry—\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* sweep \w them|strong="H8121"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2962"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H2416"\w* rejoice \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w they|strong="H2962"\w* see \w they|strong="H2962"\w* are avenged; \w they|strong="H2962"\w* \w will|strong="H2416"\w* wash their feet \w in|strong="H5518"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* blood \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* wicked.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* say, “There \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reward \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*! There \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w who|strong="H6662"\w* judges \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth!”
